Hello There!

As of now I can't think any of the words that I should say or where should I start with, but if you are wondering how is my life of being a service desk and a developer? Just continue reading!

Service desk and being a developer at the same time is hard to manage, the time and sleep is the main conflict but tne good thing is that while you adapt to the new processes being a service desk you are also adapting to the new technologies that is coming out lately like the flutter, react and other JS frameworks.It's also plausible that taking a lot of coffees will make your life easier.
